website_summaries.verdict: This is a near-perfect fishing pontoon boat. It's comparable to other models but also has an attached wheel, along with a storage bag.
pros: Considering it's nearly 70 pounds, not to mention the weight of any added equipment, having a steady wheel for transporting what would otherwise be a heavy, awkward boat, is valuable
cons: It's on the high end of the price spectrum

customer_reviews.title: great 'toon!!
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once so far, but it performed exactly as I wished. I am a big man, 300 lbs. and even with all my fishing gear it floated, handled, and maneuvered with great agility. This is a quality design and it seems to be quite tough. I will use it a lot in the coming months and years. The only change I would make is the stripping basket, it is too tall to sit on your lap as you paddle around, a shorter profile would work better.
customer_reviews.author: Blackdog

customer_reviews.title: Pontoon material is not durable
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these and one has a hole in the pontoon on the first trip. I have floated other pontoon boats for years and never got a hole or leak. These are real cheap pontoons and would not recommend for anything other than a pond or small lake. They are not made of a quality that I could trust on a river. Also, the pontoon leak patches do not work very good.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Ogden

customer_reviews.title: I have a lot of fun with this boat
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of fun with this boat. add a ton of pvc extras and a trolling motor. traded the rock bag for an actual anchor ----<<<<Update>>>>--- I've had this boat for for quite awhile and love it. made a lot of modification whose ideas I got off youtube but added my own flare. lots of PVC tubing for rod holders and to stick an umbrella on. changed the one wheel to two for stability. made a rig so i could control steering and thrust of my troll motor while facing forward.
customer_reviews.author: C Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great storage. If you're concerned about roll-overs but want ...
customer_reviews.text: Only 4 stars due to seat and footrest. The seat is not on a swivel. For people with back or neck issues, this makes it difficult to operate the motor or access the rear storage. Theres no other place for your feet except for on the footrest or in the water. Could really use some heavy duty netting on the bottom. Great storage. If you're concerned about roll-overs but want to be on the water with others in kayaks or canoes, this is for you. VERY stable. There are other brands/makes out there but this seems to be the most versatile. Even great in salt water. I've bought 7 for family members so far. May buy another for me.
customer_reviews.author: John Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Pontoon boat
customer_reviews.text: I took it out once in a snow storm and it did well.I like it however the comfort is OK but not excellent due to limited space.Time will tell but I am happy with it.These boats allow you to be stealthy over the fish.Get the bull nose rudder to steer better,it tries to go wherever it wants to but the rudder helps.I mounted LED NAV lights to the frame.Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Coker

customer_reviews.title: Great boat
customer_reviews.text: I've only taken this out once but I love it. Quick to put together, easy to get around the lake on. Fits mostly inflated in my Trailblazer with the 2nd and 3rd row seats down. Fits with just 3rd row down mostly deflated.
customer_reviews.author: FT

customer_reviews.title: A little heavy, but we'll built and stable.
customer_reviews.text: First time in the water and it was a blast. Super stable while in the water. The reviews were spot on with the need for upgrades to the anchor bag to a anchor. I wish they would have included a pressure guage with it also. Overall I'm super happy with it and I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Boat
customer_reviews.text: This is a rather large item, it no way fits into some kind of a bag to cary, as shown in one of the photos. Took about 3 hrs to assemble. Works like a charm, stable, maneuverable and comfortable. Everyone in the family liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Aloha Man

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic boat, lowest price anywhere and unbelievably fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Hard to believe you can get this much boat for the money! VERY stable, lots of storage and easy to maneuver. Received the boat 36 hours after I ordered it and in perfect shape. Takes about an hour to assemble. Numerous YouTube videos showing assembly and useful modifications.
customer_reviews.author: David Frye

customer_reviews.title: "no questions asked is a lie"
customer_reviews.text: The wheel was warped beyond use. I have sent in the paperwork as they requested and have not heard back, seems the "no questions asked " for repair parts on a new boat was not true, I have not gotten a reply to the e-mail and it has been about three weeks SO FAR can't get anyone on the phone the message says they are busy and will return call, this does not happen either. I guess I will have to buy a wheel myself so I can use the boat.
customer_reviews.author: swamprat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lil boat
customer_reviews.text: Have to say so far I love this pontoon boat. I was a little concerned about how well it would float and with me being 290 lbs I have to say it exceeded my expectations. Rowing is a little bit of a challenge if you've never rowed before. Only issue I have is the wheel had a huge slash in it when I opened it. But the warranty department at classic accessories is getting me a new one. All in all a great product
customer_reviews.author: wolves122

customer_reviews.title: Fishing made easy
customer_reviews.text: My inflatable pontoon boat arrived on the date it was supposed to. The box was in very good shape. The pontoon went togeather very easy. The wheel bracket required some grinding to allow it to slide in and out without sticking. I've used the pontoon twice so far and it works better than I expected. Caught a lot of fish.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: GOT THE FISHING FEVER!
customer_reviews.text: TOOK IT ON THE WATER FOR THE FIRST TIME YESTERDAY. WHAT A GREAT BOAT. PERFECT FOR THE GUY THAT DOES NOT OWN A PICK-UP OR HAVE A WAY TO TOW A BOAT. UN-ASSEMBLED IT FITS IN THE BACK OF MY SUV AND I ASSEMBLE IT ON SITE, TAKES 20 MIN OR SO. BECAUSE YOU SIT ON THE SURFACE WITHOUT A RUDDER I WOULD SUGGEST USING A DRIFT SOCK AS THE WIND TENDS TO PUSH YOU A GREAT DEAL. I CAN'T WAIT TO GET ON THE WATER AGAIN. A BIG THUMBS UP FOR THIS BEAUTY.
customer_reviews.author: Dindi08

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boat
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Easy to get in and out of for me. Much easier than our canoe. We float a small river where the water is sometimes really low. This boat floats through much more of the river than a canoe and is a thousand times easier to get out of to wade the rapids. The boat is very slow through still water sections, but a pair of flippers help you there. Overall great quality and we got a great price deal on it from Amazon. We bought six between three of us!
customer_reviews.author: Preston Breeding

customer_reviews.title: Great boat for all occasions!
customer_reviews.text: Quality boat that gives me the freedom to go when I want and I feel safe as it's well built! I'm a big guy so I had to make a couple of adjustments, check out YouTube.
customer_reviews.author: VegasCouple

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a champ up north on a small lake with ...
customer_reviews.text: This is quite simply a very quality product. Every piece of it feels well made and engineered for ease of use. Fits in the trunk of my Ford Taurus with plenty of room for clothes for a trip up north. Adding a swivel for the seat. Using a Minn Kota C2 trolling motor. Worked like a champ up north on a small lake with little wind...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this. It’s portable and sturdy. He is in the process of accessorizing it with a trolling motor and a plate that keeps his feet dry.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl ansel

customer_reviews.title: Highly revommend this craft. Fit, form and function.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Substantial craft..well made..I can use it for fishing on the river or as a kayak substitute. Way more comfortable,stable and xtremely safe.. And, if your a bigger person this is your tkt for river or lake adventure !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the toon
customer_reviews.text: Love the toon! I don't like the location of the MInn Kota motor mount over the back of my shoulder - very inconvenient. I modified & moved the mount over to the side and that is an better acceptable location and then I bought a handle extension.
customer_reviews.author: George G.

customer_reviews.title: Good fishing platform and fun.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Lots of storage compartments. Good platform for fishing. Easy to manuver and row. Seat is slightly uncomfortable for long periods and the wingnuts work loose and the seat moves. Use better locknuts to avoid that. Works great with a 30lb thrust trolling motor. The description does not specify 30lb thrust max. That should be added to the description, it is not sturdy enough for a bigger trolling motor.
customer_reviews.author: drako

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and variety of possible positions helps the fit. It would have been better if they had included suggested pumps and pressure check devises but it is a great river and lake boat.
customer_reviews.author: Van Neie

customer_reviews.title: hubby wants to sell it
customer_reviews.text: Hubby was not a fan of this boat he felt confined & unable to move. He couldnt keep the boat in place to fish it just wanted to go all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Classic pontoon boat
customer_reviews.text: I used this last weekend in. 9 mile river float & this boat was awesome even in a the rapids. I would definitely recommend this pontoon boat!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fast Eddie

customer_reviews.title: I love this boat
customer_reviews.text: I love this boat !!!! Quality all the way. comfortable easy to take down and put together, If you're looking for a quality pontoon you can't go wrong here!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Buy this today.
customer_reviews.text: Stop looking and buy one, the fish are waiting. Awesome, you will be very happy. Get the 30# thrust 30” shaft trolling motor and your done.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck R

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Took a bit to put together, but quality, durability and sturdiness is top notch!!
customer_reviews.author: Big Willy

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Used it a few times already and it works good
customer_reviews.author: outlaw85

customer_reviews.title: Think I bought the best one love this very easy to put together works ...
customer_reviews.text: I have all ways used a float tube finely bought a pontoon. Think I bought the best one love this very easy to put together works just great I am 6 5. 290lbs and it works great for me
customer_reviews.author: Brent J Peasnall

customer_reviews.title: I like it. Tried it out last week in a ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Tried it out last week in a lake and it was stable, comfortable, and easy to maneuver. Appears to be well made. Got it to travel with my travel trailer, improvised a rack for the frame on the rear bumper and stowed the rest. Was going to get another for my wife, but she did not like rowing. Couldn't get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Turner

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love it can't wait to take it down the river
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5+stars
customer_reviews.text: This boat is the bomb for fishing, went on a Kyak trip with friends and this boat held up to everything it met. I'm looking to do some of the modifications that I have seen on YouTube. Should of bought this year's ago.
customer_reviews.author: brent mizell

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about it, except the one need to put two wheels on the boat, I’m a woman and it’s to had to move with one wheel, I’m going to custom it and put two wheels on it. Thank You I love it
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Amazing boat great price goes in any water
customer_reviews.text: This is a great boat for fishing! If you have a hard time learning how to maneuver just keep practicing. Think of it like a waterbug.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Float
customer_reviews.text: This is a well engineered and built one man fishing boat. The wheel make it able to go almost anywhere any time. Highly recommend this to all water and fishing enthusiasts!
customer_reviews.author: Tulsa1965

customer_reviews.title: Boat is real stable and easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.text: Only problem I have had is the anchor system does not work to good. Takes about 15 lbs to hold the boat in slow current. It is extremely hard to pull the anchor up. Still working on modifying the pulleys. Overall the boat is great.
customer_reviews.author: M?mmmm

customer_reviews.title: This raft is an awesome tool for the serious fly fisherman
customer_reviews.text: This raft is an awesome tool for the serious fly fisherman, very stable in the water and easy to assemble. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Mike Perry

customer_reviews.title: Colorado
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, bought a second for my husband. Works great on the river fishing
customer_reviews.author: John carstedt

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Had it on the water once. Performed well with just ores. If you buy this I recommend you also get electric air compressor inflating by hand pump takes too long. Air compressor less than 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: charles

customer_reviews.title: Great boats. Would recommend them
customer_reviews.text: Great boats. Would recommend them. Easy to set up and break down to fit in small spaces. Have caught a lot of fish off ours in the high lakes.
customer_reviews.author: Randy DeMaris

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Has made quite a few great fishing ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Has made quite a few great fishing trips. Great anchor system . good for the larger man who likes to fish lakes.

customer_reviews.title: Haven't even inflated the boat yet but I love the videos on you tube
customer_reviews.text: Haven't even inflated the boat yet but I love the videos on you tube. I can imagine myself having a relaxing day on the lake or pond.

customer_reviews.text: takes a while to put together. Need a good pump to inflate it. But once that was done had a blast on it. Never felt unsafe on it and was easy to sit on. Great product

customer_reviews.text: Supports me, my gear and maneuvers well with the oars. I will add a C2 30 Minn Kota as I will not battle the wind to get back to shore...

customer_reviews.title: great product

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Set it up In my backyard the day I received it. Easy set up. I was disappointed that it had no case to carry it in just like it shows in the website.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these! No issues so far. Easy to assemble and a joy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is my boat, there are many like it, but this is MINE.
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to first put it together, but it's been a real pleasure having everything fold up into a single bundle and putting this thing together is very fast. Takes longer to pump the pontoons up (10 Minutes) then it does to put together(5 minutes). Yep 15 minutes I'm paddling over to my favorite fishing hole. So much more enjoyable than my kayak, much more stable, I can take and store more things to make the day more pleasurable. The storage bags stay put, I haven't put a trolling motor on it yet, but there is plenty of room for it and the battery. Believe me your going to love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble,instructions easy to follow. Very satisfied with purchase. frame is very well built. strong welds.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: great little water craft
customer_reviews.text: The only knock I have, is its susceptibility to getting blown around by the wind. The anchor helps some, but you really are like a top. The other thing is, in any cross wind,rowing straight line forward, is very tricky. I suppose ANY lightweight craft will do the same.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence M. Levy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and handles great
customer_reviews.text: Having a blast! Comfortable and handles great. One person can transport just wish it came with manual air pump other wise great product so far.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great looking pontoon. Easy to assemble and plenty of removable storage. I can't wait to get it out to the bighorn in May to do some fly fishing.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value! Showed up on time was easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value! Showed up on time was easy to put together and worked perfectly in the water the next day!! Couldn't be happier.....

customer_reviews.title: So easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: So easy to handle. Extremely pleased with storage available. Didn't know the wind and current would take me everywhere, but am learning to deal with it. A new product learning curve.

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise used the boat extensively while float fishing the rivers in North Carolina and loved it. Added some rod holders to the
customer_reviews.text: While the boat has exceeded all expectations it does have a problem with the seat slipping and the bolts pulling through the bott of the seat. Will replace with a higher quality seat. Otherwise used the boat extensively while float fishing the rivers in North Carolina and loved it. Added some rod holders to the wire cage for extra rods. But well worth the money. Easy to assemble and take apart for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Rhoden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fun times this summer on this jewel of a boat!

customer_reviews.title: but that is easily overcome. Well built and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: No swivel seat, but that is easily overcome. Well built and easy to put together. Lots of storage! You will not regret getting this. Could have a 4 rod holder system behind the seat, but that can be modified cheaply as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had found it sooner
customer_reviews.text: I am new to fishing. I couldn't afford a regular boat, not yet anyway. This boat allows me to get into the spots that a full size boat can't. Making me more successful and have fun. I am going to get a trolling motor though because rowing is to much like work. To bad Michigan has cold weather cause I would be out everyday of the year on this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Perkola

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This boat came with everything I needed. I would recommend this pontoon to anyone. Great buy!! Love it! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Thad Seick

customer_reviews.title: Love it, bought two !!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pontoon boat. I often go fishing by myself and as a woman who weighs under 150lbs, I find the set up and break down of this to be very easy. I have no problem doing it all by myself and I can be in the water within 20 minutes. I can break it down and pack it up in under 10min. I use a Torqeedo 1003L on the motor mount to get myself up river and then I spend hours floating back down to my vehicle. Makes for a perfect day ! I bought two so I can take a friend when I want. I highly recommend this pontoon to everyone !
customer_reviews.author: ShelleyTurk

customer_reviews.title: awesome  pontoon
customer_reviews.text: Very stable boat. Easily assembled and be in the water quickly. Love this boat. Wish I had gotten early spring.

customer_reviews.title: Colorado XT Pontoon Boat
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with the quality of this boat, have used it several times on the river this summer and found it lived up to its description by the manufacturer. Great quality and workmanship, well designed and durable.

customer_reviews.title: And my son is extremely happy. The next one i purchase will be for ...
customer_reviews.text: Because i'm currently deployed for the next couple months I wont be able to do a true review. I will say this the boat arrived with in 4 days. And my son is extremely happy. The next one i purchase will be for myself.

customer_reviews.title: Great for floating down the river!
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly. Meets expectations. It does everything and has everything it has listed. I use it to float the Missouri river and cast flies. Perfect for when your friends are working and you have nobody to maneuver the drift boat.

Make sure you have a good pair of vice grips to crimp the forks together so the cotter pin can be inserted. Check out the Colorado XT on "Youtube". This product sells itself. Yes, I would recommend this product to a friend.

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but not sure if it is the right boat for me

I live on the Shenandoah River and it is easy to get in and out of the river. The orange has faded a lot in one season, But I stored it in the yard by the river. It was in the sun about 40% of the day. Overall I don't think I would buy this again.

We can't find any type of adapter that will work and it did not come with one. One side won't stay inflated. Bought a trolling motor and battery which about sunk it. Looks really nice, just doesn't function well.

The pin holes were off enough [up to 1/2 inch] that new holes had to be drilled to complete assembly. Otherwise it is a great value for a 9ft pontoon. 4 stars is for the hassel of fabricating parts required to assemble.

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY!!!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: But it is a neat little rig full of handy equipment and i thought it would be a great bargain, but i just dont want to have ...
customer_reviews.text: First day i get it in the mail and put it all together, and i didn't even make it to the river! One of the bladders had a hole in it already just from shipping. So I reasoned just to return it. If the bladders are that fragile they rip just from shipping then I would rather get a fishing kayak. But it is a neat little rig full of handy equipment and i thought it would be a great bargain, but i just dont want to have to deal with weak bladders.
customer_reviews.author: austin

product_meta.title: Classic Accessories Colorado XT Inflatable Pontoon Boat With Transport Wheel & Motor Mount
product_meta.description:
The Colorado XT by Classic Accessories is a 9' pontoon boat that has a 400 lb capacity, flexible storage options, an integrated transport wheel that aids in moving the Colorado XT to the water and stows when you are fishing, and removable gear bags (with included shoulder strap) that provide customizable storage with 20 pockets and two insulated drink holders. The Colorado XT's durable construction features brass oar locks, heavy-duty pontoons with abrasion resistant coated PVC bottoms and tough nylon tops, cold and heat-resistant HD vinyl bladders, a strong powder-coated steel tube frame, and 7' two-piece aluminum oars. The Colorado XT's many features also include a two position weatherproof motor mount, wire rear storage and battery platform, removable stripping basket for side or lap mounting, two detachable foam fly patches, a multi-position rod holder, fully adjustable deluxe cushioned seat, and a front boat retention cord. The ingenious anchor system includes a fillable mesh bag, and a cleat and pulley system can route the anchor on either side of the boat. This boat is ready for your next adventure on the river, lake, or pond with a Class 1 river rating. The Colorado XT meets the strict safety standards of the ABYC, and also includes safety features such as a higher ride for improved visibility, combination fill/quick-deflation valves, tow rings, non-slip footrests, and a unique dual-side stripping apron with fish ruler that allows easy entry and exit without unclipping. We have also included a free trial membership to Trout Unlimited.

AMAZON.COM


Front View Front View Gear Bag Rear View Anchor Rear Storage Transport Wheel Foam Fly Patch COLORADO XT PONTOON BOAT
9 FOOT HIGH-CAPACITY PONTOON BOAT WITH TRANSPORT WHEEL, REMOVABLE STRIPPING BASKET AND GEAR BAGS
 * BOAT SPECIFICATIONS
 *  9 foot pontoons
 *  400 lb capacity
 *  River rating—Class 1
 *  Assembled size: 108"l 56"w 26"h
 *  Weight: 68 lbs
 *  2-year warranty

 * SPECIAL FEATURES
 *  Removable side pockets provide customizable storage, including 20 pockets and two insulated drink holders
 *  Removable side pockets can combine to create a portable gear bag
 *  Transport wheel allows easy access to your favorite fishing spot and stows up out of the way when fishing
 *  Removable stripping basket for side or over-the-lap mounting
 *  Sturdy two position motor mount for trolling
 *  Wire rear storage and battery platform
 *  Rod holder can be mounted in three different positions on each oar stand
 *  Anchor system with fillable mesh bag; cleat and pulley controls can fit on either right or left side of boat
 *  Two detachable foam fly patches
 *  Front boat retention cord

 * COMFORT FEATURES
 *  Three oar-lock positions
 *  Padded fold-down plastic seat
 *  Seat and footrests adjust to a wide variety of leg lengths

 * CONSTRUCTION FEATURES
 *  Heavy-duty pontoons with abrasion-resistant PVC bottoms and tough nylon tops
 *  Powder-coated steel tube frame
 *  Bronze oar-locks
 *  Rugged two-piece 7 foot aluminum oars
 *  Cold and heat-resistant bladders
 *  Combination quick inflation/deflation valves

 * SAFETY FEATURES
 *  Safety labeling as per
 *  ABYC standards
 *  Rides high for improved visibility
 *  Non-slip footrests
 *  Removable stripping basket

COLORADO XT PONTOON BOAT
The Colorado XT inflatable personal pontoon fishing boat offers huge storage capacity; includes removable gear bags, 20 pockets and 2 insulated drink holders. Transport wheel makes moving boat on land a breeze for one person. Gear bags combine for greater portability and capacity. Removable stripping basket for side or lap mounting. Weatherproof motor mount. Wire rear storage and battery platform. Fishing rod holder can be mounted in 6 different positions. Integrated anchor system with fillable mesh bag, cord and pulley can be mounted from either side or back. Detachable foam fly patch. Padded plastic seat for extra comfort. 3 oar-lock positions. Seat mount and foot rests adjust to any leg length. Unique dual-side stripping apron with fish ruler allows entry and exit of pontoon boat without un-clipping. Rides high for improved visibility. Combination fill/quick deflation valves. Tow rings. Non-slip foot rests. No tools needed for assembly. Brass oar locks. Heavy-duty pontoons with abrasion-resistant PVC bottoms and tough nylon tops. Powder coated steel tube frame. 7' two-piece aluminum oars. Cold and heat resistant bladders. 9' pontoons. 400 lb. capacity. River rating-Class I. Assembled weight 77 lbs. Assembled size is 108" long x 56" wide x 26" high (to top of seat). 2-year warranty.

feature_bullets: Colorado XT assembled size 108"L x 56"W x 28"H (to top of seat), Weight: 77 lbs.

Heavy-duty pontoon boat with abrasion-resistant PVC bottom, tough nylon top, powder-coated steel tube frame, bronze oar locks, cold and heat-resistant bladders and rugged 7-foot two-piece aluminum oars
Removable side pockets can combine to create a portable gear bag while providing customizable storage, including 20 pockets and 2 insulated drink holders

Transport wheel allows easy access to your favorite fishing spot and stows up out of the way when fishing; safety features include labeling as per ABYC standards, pontoon boat rides high for improved visibility, tow rings and non-slip footrests
